title: "Any religion that does not promote equality, any religion that doesn't ensure that you have the dignity of being a human being is not a religion, according to me. So it is as good as a disease," says Karnataka minister Priyank Kharge on Udayanidhi Stalin's remarks on 'Sanatan Dharma'
